'''
依据身份证和手机号，获取常用的变量信息

作者：liyingkun

时间：2017-10-26
'''
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import pickle
import re
import os
from datetime import datetime

pkg_path = os.path.split(os.path.realpath(__file__))[0]
dict_path = os.path.join(pkg_path, 'addr_dict')
# idno_path = r'C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\share_datamodel\lyk\RTHX\idno_dict.pkl'
# mobile_path = r'C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\share_datamodel\lyk\RTHX\mobile_addr_dict.pkl'

idno_path = os.path.join(dict_path, 'idno_dict.pkl')
mobile_path = os.path.join(dict_path, 'mobile_addr_dict.pkl')

with open(idno_path, 'rb') as f:
    idno_province = pickle.load(f)
    idno_city = pickle.load(f)

with open(mobile_path, 'rb') as f:
    mobile_addr = pickle.load(f)


# 1.依据身份证，获取地址信息

[docs]def get_idno_prov(x):
    try:
        return idno_province[str(x).strip()[:2]]
    except:
        return np.nan




[docs]def get_idno_city(x):
    try:
        return idno_city[str(x).strip()[:4]]
    except:
        return np.nan




[docs]def f_age(idno):
    present_year = datetime.today().year
    try:
        return present_year - int(idno[6:10])
    except:
        return np.nan




[docs]def f_gender(idno):
    '''
    依据身份证计算出性别 1：男  0：女
    :param idno:
    :return:
    '''
    try:
        return int(idno[-2]) % 2
    except:
        return np.nan




[docs]def f_dict_prov_level(x):
    pattern_1 = '上海|北京|天津|广东|澳门|香港'
    pattern_2 = '江苏|山东|福建|浙江|安徽'
    pattern_3 = '湖北|湖南|河南|河北|江西|山西|陕西'
    pattern_4 = '广西|海南|云南|四川|贵州|重庆'
    pattern_5 = '黑龙江|吉林|辽宁|内蒙古|甘肃|新疆|青海|宁夏|西藏'
    if re.search(pattern_1, str(x)) is not None:
        return 1
    elif re.search(pattern_2, str(x)) is not None:
        return 2
    elif re.search(pattern_3, str(x)) is not None:
        return 3
    elif re.search(pattern_4, str(x)) is not None:
        return 4
    elif re.search(pattern_5, str(x)) is not None:
        return 5
    else:
        return 6




[docs]def f_cid_prov_lvl(idno_prov):
    '''
    获取身份证的省份等级
    :param id_card_address:
    :return:
    '''
    return f_dict_prov_level(idno_prov)




[docs]def f_mobile_prov_lvl(mobile_province):
    '''
    获取手机号归属地的省份等级
    :param mobile_province:
    :return:
    '''
    return f_dict_prov_level(mobile_province)




[docs]def f_dict_city_level(x):
    pattern_1 = '北京|上海|广州|深圳|天津'  # 一线
    pattern_2 = '杭州|南京|济南|重庆|青岛|大连|宁波|厦门'  # 二线发达
    pattern_3 = '成都|武汉|哈尔滨|沈阳|西安|长春|长沙|福州|郑州|石家庄|苏州|佛山|东莞|无锡|烟台|太原'  # 二线中等发达
    pattern_4 = '合肥|南昌|南宁|昆明|温州|淄博|唐山'  # 二线发展较弱

    if x not in [None, np.nan]:
        if re.search(pattern_1, str(x)) is not None:
            return 1
        elif re.search(pattern_2, str(x)) is not None:
            return 2
        elif re.search(pattern_3, str(x)) is not None:
            return 3
        elif re.search(pattern_4, str(x)) is not None:
            return 4
        else:
            return 5  # 三线以下城市
    else:
        return 6  # 缺失




[docs]def f_cid_city_lvl(id_city):
    '''
    身份证地址信息 获取城市，并归约于对应的等级
    :param id_city:
    :return:
    '''
    return f_dict_city_level(id_city)




[docs]def f_mobile_city_lvl(mobile_city):
    '''
    手机号归属地 获取城市，并归约于对应的等级
    :param mobile_city:
    :return:
    '''
    return f_dict_city_level(mobile_city)



# 2.依据手机号前7位，获取归属地信息


[docs]def get_mobile_7(x):
    return str(x).strip()[:7]




[docs]def f_mobiletype_clean(x):
    if x not in [None, np.nan]:
        if re.search('移动', x) is not None:
            return 1  #
        elif re.search('联通', x) is not None:
            return 2
        elif re.search('电信', x) is not None:
            return 3
    else:
        return x




[docs]def f_get_mobile_city(mobile):
    '''
    单次查询
    :param mobile:
    :return:
    '''
    try:
        qy = 'MobileNumber=="{}"'.format(get_mobile_7(mobile))
        return mobile_addr.query(qy).MobileCity.values[0]
    except:
        return np.nan




[docs]def f_get_mobile_prov(mobile):
    '''
    单次查询
    :param mobile:
    :return:
    '''
    try:
        qy = 'MobileNumber=="{}"'.format(get_mobile_7(mobile))
        return mobile_addr.query(qy).MobileProv.values[0]
    except:
        return np.nan




[docs]def f_get_mobile_type(mobile):
    '''
    单次查询 运营商类型
    1：移动  ； 2：联通 ；  3 ：电信
    :param mobile:
    :return:
    '''
    try:
        qy = 'MobileNumber=="{}"'.format(get_mobile_7(mobile))
        return f_mobiletype_clean(mobile_addr.query(qy).MobileType.values[0])
    except:
        return np.nan




[docs]def f_Get_mobile_Info(mobile):
    '''
    批量获取出mobile相关的信息
    :param mobile: 由电话号码构成的series或含有mobile的dataframe
    :return:
    '''
    f1 = str(type(mobile)) == "<class 'pandas.core.frame.DataFrame'>"
    f2 = str(type(mobile)) == "<class 'pandas.core.series.Series'>"
    if f1 and 'mobile' in mobile.columns:
        mobile.loc[:, 'MobileNumber'] = mobile.mobile.apply(get_mobile_7)
        df = pd.merge(mobile, mobile_addr[['MobileNumber', 'MobileType', 'MobileCity', 'MobileProv']], how='left')
        df.loc[:, 'MobileType'] = df.MobileType.apply(f_mobiletype_clean)
        df = df.assign(
            mobile_city_lvl=lambda x: x.MobileCity.apply(f_mobile_city_lvl),
            mobile_prov_lvl=lambda x: x.MobileProv.apply(f_mobile_prov_lvl),
        )
        return df
    elif f2:
        mobile.name = 'mobile'
        mobile = pd.DataFrame(mobile)
        mobile.loc[:, 'MobileNumber'] = mobile.mobile.apply(get_mobile_7)
        df = pd.merge(mobile, mobile_addr[['MobileNumber', 'MobileType', 'MobileCity', 'MobileProv']], how='left')
        df.loc[:, 'MobileType'] = df.MobileType.apply(f_mobiletype_clean)
        df = df.assign(
            mobile_city_lvl=lambda x: x.MobileCity.apply(f_mobile_city_lvl),
            mobile_prov_lvl=lambda x: x.MobileProv.apply(f_mobile_prov_lvl),
        )
        return df




[docs]def f_Get_idno_Info(idno):
    '''
    批量获取出mobile相关的信息
    :param idno: 由身份证号构成的series或含有idno列的dataframe
    :return:
    '''
    f1 = str(type(idno)) == "<class 'pandas.core.frame.DataFrame'>"
    f2 = str(type(idno)) == "<class 'pandas.core.series.Series'>"
    if f1 and 'idno' in idno.columns:
        idno.loc[:, 'age'] = idno.idno.apply(f_age)
        idno.loc[:, 'gender'] = idno.idno.apply(f_gender)
        idno.loc[:, 'idno_prov'] = idno.idno.apply(get_idno_prov)
        idno.loc[:, 'idno_city'] = idno.idno.apply(get_idno_city)
        idno = idno.assign(
            idno_prov_lvl=lambda x: x.idno_prov.apply(f_cid_prov_lvl),
            idno_city_lvl=lambda x: x.idno_city.apply(f_cid_city_lvl)
        )
        return idno
    elif f2:
        idno.name = 'idno'
        idno = pd.DataFrame(idno)
        idno.loc[:, 'age'] = idno.idno.apply(f_age)
        idno.loc[:, 'gender'] = idno.idno.apply(f_gender)
        idno.loc[:, 'idno_prov'] = idno.idno.apply(get_idno_prov)
        idno.loc[:, 'idno_city'] = idno.idno.apply(get_idno_city)
        idno = idno.assign(
            idno_prov_lvl=lambda x: x.idno_prov.apply(f_cid_prov_lvl),
            idno_city_lvl=lambda x: x.idno_city.apply(f_cid_city_lvl)
        )
        return idno



if __name__ == '__main__':
    # 测试
    df = pd.read_csv(r'C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\tn_0713\base_rawdata_0717.csv', encoding='gbk')
    aa = df.head(100).idno.apply(f_gender)
    # print(aa)

    bb = df.head(100).mobile.apply(f_get_mobile_type)
    # print(bb)

    cc = f_Get_mobile_Info(df.head(100))
    # print(cc)

    dd = f_Get_idno_Info(df.head(100))
    print(dd)
